channel.title: Dont know where to put this :'( [100%] Truth [100%]
channel.description:
Yesterday was a tragic day for many of us, Our friend Gs Pk Pure was sadly hit by a car and killed. Although he was banned from the forum many time's he always wanted to stay with us, He was the creator of some great source's such as
[ul][li]National Pkz[/li] [li]Project 2k9[/li] [li]and he also helped code 508pkz508[/li][/ul]
I am sad to see him gone. and i'm sure many of us are. His memory will always lie with us...
[size=18pt]Rest in peace, Our friend...Gs Pk Pure[/size]
Picture of his accident scene
[img]http://img168.imageshack.us/img168/486/photo1q.jpg[/img]

item.title: Dont know where to put this :'( [100%] Truth [100%]
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

First off, you have no idea how many people have faked death on this forum to receive some attention. For that, we simply have no sympathy without solid proof. Unless you can provide us with absolute proof, then we really don’t care.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Whats there to have pic’s of? His body??

[quote=“Speljohan, post:2, topic:271435”]#moparsc… err http://www.moparisthebest.com

Nobody here knows who it is, and i doubt anyone cares.

Wrong forums buddy[/quote]
Oh ok but i didnt know where to put on moparisthebest.com

and he was an inspiration to many of us
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 06, 2009, 05:40:17 am[/size][hr]I have just been down the road and taken a photo with my phone… i will upload it now
